subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Dante Cunningham matched a career high with 31 points and No. 17 Villanova rolled to its fifth straight win, 102-85 at home over No. 20 Syracuse on Saturday. The Wildcats (19-4, 7-3 Big East) got off to a sizzling start from the floor and led by 20 late in the first half. The Wildcats reached their highest point total ever in a game against Syracuse and hit the 100-point mark for the second time this season. In the first half, the Orange (18-6, 6-5) went nearly 10 minutes without a field goal and committed 13 turnovers that led to 21 Villanova points. ¶Jessica Morrow scored 17 points, Jhasmin Player added 16 points and No. 8 Baylor pulled away late to beat No. 18 Kansas State, 59-50, on Saturday. Baylor (19-3, 7-2 Big 12) snapped a two-game home losing streak in which it lost to No. 2 Oklahoma and No. 16 Texas.
